DataElement.preferredName: Informed Consent 1 Decimal Place Version Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The version number of the informed consent form.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Reference to a specific edition or version of an informed consent document.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: voluntary authorization, by a patient or research subject, with full comprehension of the risks involved, for diagnostic or investigative procedures, and for medical and surgical treatment.

Concepts.definition: Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.

ObjectClass.changeDescription: Added NCI Concept Code and effective date

Property.preferredDefinition: Version; something a little different from others of the same type; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.

Concepts.definition: A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::1_An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers._A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications._A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::1:An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.:A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers.
A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
